programme.title: Alien From Area 51: The Alien Autopsy Footage Revealed
programme.desc: There has been thousands of UFO photos and hours of video footage submitted to UFO researchers in the last 50 years, but by far the most controversial is the Alien Autopsy Footage. London businessman Ray Santilli, originally launched the footage on the TV viewing public in August 1995. Santilli claimed it showed the autopsy of a dead alien recovered from a crashed flying saucer found near Roswell, New Mexico in 1947. The body was then moved to Hanger 18 at the infamous Area 51 also known as \"Dreamland.\" Until now, no one has known the real facts behind the \"Alien Autopsy Footage.\" For over fifteen years the creators of the infamous film have remained silent. Warner Bros. made a hit feature film and the world wanted to know more. Now Ray Santilli and Gary Shoefield reveal all, including the truth about sinister Men in Black invading their lives; how the Chinese knew about the original footage; their beliefs in alien visitation to planet Earth; how governments around the globe are dealing with the phenomenon; and the genetic manipulation of human kind. An unprecedented perspective on the UFO enigma and what it means for us all, \"Alien from Area 51\" will test your beliefs and rattle you to the core. See the entire \"Alien Autopsy Footage,\" unedited and uncensored. The time is coming for alien intervention on planet Earth whether we are ready or not.

They replace those we've lost with clones and devise technology that helps us live out our greatest fantasies; from saving a failed relationship, to creating the perfect lover, to being irresistible to the opposite sex - but sometimes our deepest desires come at a terrible price. 4Ever offers customers the opportunity to live out their fantasies in a virtual world but there are secrets within 4Ever Innovations that may cost you your life.

programme.title: Asteroid Collision: Doomsday Destruction or Passing Apprehension?
programme.desc: There are over 31,000 known meteor impact sites on Earth with craters up to 186 miles in diameter. Some experts say an impact doomsday scenario is science fiction. Others say it is only a question of when . Could humanity survive? Could Earth survive.

programme.title: Crop Signs: Off-World Warnings or Technological Tampering?
programme.desc: There have been 9,000 crop circle sightings in the last 30 years globally. Are these increasingly complex designs the result of microwave emissions? Communication from extraterrestrials? A simple hoax? This program examines the possibilities.

programme.title: Egyptian Pyramids: Architectural Wonder or Alien Engineering?
programme.desc: The Pyramids of Egypt are among the largest structures ever built. Archeologists and researchers have determined ancient Egypt lacked the tools and skills required to build the pyramids. So how did the Egyptians build them over four thousand years ago.

programme.title: World Mysteries - American POWs and MIAs: Dead or Imprisoned?
programme.desc: Official U.S. government policy is that there is no credible evidence that any POWs or those listed as MIA are still alive from World War II, the Korean War or the Vietnam War. Is that a true fact? What is the truth about the fate of our POWs and MIAs.

programme.title: The Defiled: We Are All Meat
programme.desc: In a post apocalyptic world, science and technology have backfired leaving unfathomable destruction and a permanently diseased planet in its wake. A virus is mutating the human race turning innocent survivors into mindless cannibals. In a savage future world devoid of hope, a man infected with the deadly viral disease must cope with the burden of a new born son, ensuring his survival. Though he is infected, he does not allow his growing desire for human flesh to overcome his responsibility to the newborn. Along the road, traveling from town to town, he saves an unaffected woman from a certain death by facing down her perpetrators. Ultimately she joins him on his odyssey, a journey through hell on earth in search of a safe haven in which they can perhaps start a life together, both becoming committed to doing whatever it takes to make sure the child survives. Reminiscent of the work of Lynch, Maddin and Tarkovsky, The Defiled is a black and white epic of unparalleled artistry examining life, death and the ultimate sacrifice of love. Not since Carnival of Souls and Night of the Living Dead has a film captured the surreal outer dimensions of the human condition.

programme.title: Max Reload and the Nether Blasters
programme.desc: A small town video game store clerk must go from zero to hero after accidentally unleashing the forces of evil from a cursed Colecovision video game cartridge.

programme.title: Dead Walkers: Rise of the Fourth Reich
programme.desc: Reports of a growing terrorist threat in Romania lead the British Secret Service to send in some of their best men, but nobody returns from the field. In a final attempt to get through, Alpha One and Alpha Five are dispatched to try and uncover the truth. What they discover is a bizarre scientific and occult training ground of neo-Nazis descendants of Nazis who fled following their defeat in the Second World War. Over the years they have been researching the energy they call VRIL and utilizing it to grow an army of men and women who cannot be killed, because they're already dead. Attempting to stay under cover and out of sight, Alpha One and Alpha Five come face to face with the terror of the Nazi VRIL soldiers and witness shocking tortures and beatings used to energize the human soul. Mentally twisted, the leaders of this Nazi group are bent on taking over the world with their new VRIL army and bring about the rise of the 4th Reich.

programme.title: Fast Zombies with Guns
programme.desc: Collateral Damage. Sometimes, it s unavoidable. Mobster Kingpin Paul Varlo s (Charles Ramsey) attempt to kill a potential rat by poisoning his personal water supply leads to something he never saw coming an outbreak of zombie carnage! To make matters worse, these zombies are different; they re faster, meaner and they re armed With the town being overrun by fast zombies with guns, one resilient band of people are left to attempt an escape to the nearest undead-free zone and survival.Meanwhile, Jake (Tony Swansey) and his girlfriend Laura (Leena Kurishingal) are cruising their way up to this sweet, little Midwestern town. One quick business transaction with the local mob boss, and they can continue on their way to some fun in the sun, as planned. However, what they discover is a deserted town at first.Will the group survive the terror that has befallen them? Will Jake and Laura get their money?? Will the zombies run out of bullets??? The answers can be found in Fast Zombies with Guns.

programme.title: Melvin
programme.desc: MELVIN is dead... Now, three years after his accidental murder, he is finally making up for lost time. After enlisting the involuntary help of nerdy college student Norton Pincus, he's ready to take on those who are responsible for his death. Melvin's thirst for vengeance will take this dynamic dork duo on a mind-blowing streak of throat ripping, vomit spewing, head decapitating and much, much more. Featuring a cameo by Troma Entertainment's Lloyd Kaufman (The Toxic Avenger, Poultrygeist) and songs from The Sawyer Family, Monday With a Bullet and Double Plus Good. Melvin will teach you that getting picked on at school can be a real killer.

programme.title: Zombie Massacre: Army of the Dead
programme.desc: An evil and corrupt U.S. government agency accidentally unleashes a virus on a small town while attempting to perfect a top-secret biological weapon designed to create the perfect army. The experiment goes horrificly wrong, when the advanced biological weapon transforms the residents of a sleepy Maryland town into ravenous flesh-eating Monsters - Zombies so bloodthirsty for human flesh that nothing can stop the carnage. A handful of citizens who have remained uninfected seek sanctuary in a local movie theater, holed up together preparing to make a last stand against the undead. This gore-soaked shocker is not for the squeamish, Zombie Massacre: Army of the Dead will rattle you to your core.

programme.title: The Bisbee Cannibal Club
programme.desc: Vegetarians are disappearing from the little town of Bisbee, AZ. When a group of locals discover that their secret hallucinatory cactus garden has been used as a human barbecue and burial site, the existence of the Bisbee Cannibal Club becomes horrifyingly apparent. They form a vigilante gang, calling themselves The Bisbee Cannibal Hunters, to avenge their garden, save a vegetarian or two from being eaten and try to survive the Cannibal attack from the legions of flesh eaters now running amok. Bonus Features includes the award winning short A Road Kill Cautionary Tale.

programme.title: Sherlock - Dressed to Kill
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes sets out to discover why a trio of murderous villains, including a dangerously attractive female, are desperate to obtain three unassuming and inexpensive little music boxes.

programme.title: Outpost in Morocco
programme.desc: After escorting an Emirs daughter to her fathers stronghold, French Foreign Legion Captain Gerards unit joins an isolated Moroccan outpost facing imminent attack by rebel Bedouin tribes.

programme.title: T-Bird Gang
programme.desc: A high school boy, out to find his fathers killer, joins up with a gang of juvenile delinquents.

programme.title: Let There Be Light
programme.desc: A documentary, filmed shortly after the end of WW2, shot entirely in a US Army psychiatric hospital. Candidly shot, the film shows the mental casualties of war - soldiers with PTSD and other neurological issues: their symptoms, how they cope and, if theyre lucky, how they are cured.

programme.title: The Violent Years
programme.desc: Paula Parkins is the teenage daughter of wealthy parents who dont seem to make time for her, so she looks for thrills as the leader of her all girl gang who steal, rob, and rape young men.

programme.title: Manos: The Hands of Fate
programme.desc: A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden, underground, devil-worshiping cult led by the fearsome Master and his servant Torgo.

programme.title: Patterns
programme.desc: When Fred Staples is recruited onto the board of a high-powered New York corporation, he finds his ethics and ambition at odds.

programme.title: Champagne Safari
programme.desc: Photographed and produced by both Jackson Leighter...and his wife...and, while not wishing to disillusion those who state this has only been seen at film festivals, this clinker of a travelogue was booked and seen in thousands of theatres in 1954. It follows Rita Hayworth and Prince Aly Kahn---with all the production value of a home-movie made by Joe Blow---through their wedding trip, which started at the long-lost city of Pompeii, Italy, preceded to Athens and then to Cairo.They and their retinue move up the Nile to Luxor and into the African domain of Alys father, the Aga Kahn.

programme.title: The Negro Soldier
programme.desc: The history of and contributions made by black Americans in the armed forces from the Revolutionary War to the 1940s.

programme.title: Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: A special agent from Chicago is sent out west to bring in the notorious Reno brothers.

programme.title: The Phantom Planet
programme.desc: Astronaut drawn to asteroid and miniaturized by atmosphere.

programme.title: Inner Sanctum
programme.desc: Murderer hides out in boarding house in small town.

programme.title: The Red House
programme.desc: Old man conceals dark secret from adopted teen daughter.

programme.title: Salt of the Earth
programme.desc: Mexican workers at a Zinc mine call a general strike.

programme.title: The Hoodlum
programme.desc: Sociopath criminal masterminds armored car robbery.

programme.title: The Sadist
programme.desc: Three people driving into Los Angeles for a Dodgers game have car trouble and pull off into an old wrecking yard where they are held at bay by a bloodthirsty psycho and his crazy girlfriend.

programme.title: Sherlock – Woman in Green
programme.desc: Murdered young women have finger severed off.

programme.title: War Comes to America
programme.desc: Part VIII of the \"Why We Fight\" series of wartime documentaries. This entry attempts to describe the factors leading up to Americas entry into the Second World War, and shows how the pattern of the Axis powerss aggression turned the American people against isolationism.

programme.title: The Fog Island
programme.desc: A man invites a group of people to a holiday in his island home, intending to exact revenge on them.

programme.title: Tulsa
programme.desc: Woman oil-catter obsessed with wealth in power in Tulsa.

programme.title: Bela Lugosi Meets a Brooklyn Gorilla
programme.desc: Two goofy entertainers meet a mad scientist on a jungle island.

programme.title: Planet Outlaws
programme.desc: A 20th Century pilot named Buck Rogers and his young friend Buddy Wade awake from 500 years in suspended animation to find that the world has been taken over by the outlaw army of Killer Kane.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: A sheriff tries to stop homesteader conflicts in the West after the Civil War.

programme.title: Bride of the Gorilla
programme.desc: The owner of a plantation in the jungle marries a beautiful woman. Shortly afterward, he is plagued by a strange voodoo curse which transforms him into a gorilla.

programme.title: The Cummington Story
programme.desc: War refugees begin new lives in a small Massachusetts town.

programme.title: Hollow Triumph
programme.desc: Pursued by the big-time gambler he robbed, John Muller takes a new identity, with ironic results.

programme.title: Trapped
programme.desc: Secret Service agents make a deal with a counterfeiting inmate to be released on early parole if he will help them recover some bogus moneymaking plates, but he plans to double cross them.

programme.title: Thunderbolt
programme.desc: A WW2 documentary on the P-47 Thunderbolt fighter\/bomber pilots in missions (Operation Strangle) from their base in Corsica to Northern Italy in 1944, destroying railroads, bridges, trains, vehicles and hard targets.

programme.title: Sherlock – Woman in Green
programme.desc: Murdered young women have finger severed off.

programme.title: House on Haunted Hill
programme.desc: Deadly overnight party in a haunted house.

programme.title: Carnival of Souls
programme.desc: Drowned woman wanders nether-life.

programme.title: Outpost in Morocco
programme.desc: After escorting an Emirs daughter to her fathers stronghold, French Foreign Legion Captain Gerards unit joins an isolated Moroccan outpost facing imminent attack by rebel Bedouin tribes.

programme.title: Shoot to Kill
programme.desc: Woman marries corrupt deputy DA to get evidence of murder frame.

programme.title: Beneath the 12-Mile Reef
programme.desc: Fierce competition among sponge fishermen forces a Greek-American family to fish in the dangerous 12-mile reef area off the western coast of Florida.

programme.title: Bloodlust!
programme.desc: A crazed hunter kidnaps people and turns them loose on his private estate, where he hunts them for sport.

programme.title: Charade
programme.desc: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Who can she trust.

programme.title: Fear in the Night
programme.desc: Man dreams he committed murder. Was it real.

programme.title: The Battle of San Pietro
programme.desc: Director John Huston documents the Battle of San Pietro - a small town in Italy that blocked the way for the Allied forces from the Germans.

programme.title: High School Caesar
programme.desc: Matt Stevens is the big man at high school. He sweats the students for protection money, acquires copies of tests for a fee, and has rigged the votes so he can beat Kelly in the election ..

programme.title: Murder Once Removed
programme.desc: A doctor and the wife of one of his wealthy patients hatch a plot to get rid of her husband so they can be together and get his money.

programme.title: PEACE OF QUEV
programme.desc: Peace of Quev is a portrait of Brooklyn artist Quindell Evans, whose music and poetry uplift his community and those around him.

programme.title: CLOSURE
programme.desc: Angela, an African-American raised by a Caucasian couple in a large, multiracial family in Washington State, comes face to face with her birth mother for the first time, and meets family members who had never known she was even born including her birth father.

programme.title: NURSE.FIGHTER.BOY.
programme.desc: While working as a night-shift nurse to support her son, Jude, a widowed single mother undergoing treatment for sickle cell disease meets and enters into a relationship with Silence, a troubled and brooding boxer who becomes a father figure for the young boy.

programme.title: DOO DOO'S REVENGE
programme.desc: Doo Doo s Revenge compels us to ask the questions: at what age did I have learn to swallow my hurt? Would I do what Doo Doo did.

programme.title: The Destiny of Lesser Animals
programme.desc: A Ghanaian police inspector embarks upon a dangerous, crime-laden journey to realize his ultimate dream - to escape the ghosts of his past and return to America. Infusing the policier genre with West African cinematic traditions and a neorealist emphasis on everyday life, the film becomes the story of one man's journey to find his purpose in the context of post-colonial Ghanaian independence.

programme.title: THE ART OF AMA ATA AIDOO
programme.desc: The Art of Ama Ata Aidoo explores the artistic contribution of one of Africa s foremost women writers. The film charts Aidoo s creative journey over seven decades and celebrates the acclaimed Pan-African feminist, poet, playwright and novelist and provides a fascinating insight into her life.

programme.title: CURIOSITIES OF THE QUIET BOY
programme.desc: A partially deaf 12-year-old undergoes a series of supernatural phenomena in the midst of mourning his mother.

programme.title: JERMAINE
programme.desc: Jermaine Johnson is a 36-year old father of three and husband to his high-school sweetheart, Lawanna.

programme.title: The Man Who Mends Women
programme.desc: Doctor Mukwege is internationally known as the man who mends thousands of women who have been raped during the 20 years of conflicts in the East of the Democratic Republic of the Congo.

programme.title: Journey of Lion
programme.desc: Brother Howie is a Jamaican Rastafari who dreams of the land of his ancestors: Africa. On a journey in search of his roots and his identity he travels through three continents and (with great humor and sensitivity) discovers the world and Africa.

programme.title: FOUR POINTS
programme.desc: Four average citizens have been selected by the newly elected tech-genius President of the United States to participate in a game.

programme.title: Malcolm X: AN OVERWHELMING INFLUENCE ON THE BLACK POWER MOVEMENT
programme.desc: This documentary will give viewers new insight into how Malcolm X changed America through revolutionary ideas, actions, and strategies: ideas that are still relevant and playing out in today's world. Concurrently, viewers get to know Malcolm X, the man, through personal accounts with friends, co-workers and family members along with engaging photos and footage.

programme.title: ROOT UP
programme.desc: Joselie lives in Guadeloupe, F.W.I. When she inherits 5 acres of land from her late father, the former seamstress becomes a farmer at age 48.

programme.title: BURKINABE RISING
programme.desc: Burkinab Rising showcases creative nonviolent resistance in Burkina Faso. A small, landlocked country in West Africa, Burkina Faso is home to a vibrant community of artists and engaged citizens, who provide an example of the type of political change that can be achieved when people come together.

programme.title: AN UNCOMMON WOMAN
programme.desc: Mina is tired of her husband's infidelity and decides to take a drastic decision: She takes a second husband. Based on his conversations with women involved in polygamist relationships, filmmaker Abdoulaye Dao illustrates - to very funny effects - the daily life of two persons - in this case two men - who share a spouse.

programme.title: A LOVER'S CALL
programme.desc: Assim is torn between his faith and a growing bond with poet Kala when he realizes she isn't Muslim.

programme.title: Pahokee - Skip Day
programme.desc: Three award-winning short films that exquisitely capture the Pahokee community, a small black Florida town.

programme.title: La Source
programme.desc: Narrated by Oscar-nominated actor Don Cheadle (Hotel Rwanda, Crash), La Source tells the uplifting story of Josue Lajuenesse, a Haitian Princeton janitor who returns to his country after the devastating 2010 earthquake to revive his lifelong dream to bring what is most fundamental to his village's survival; clean water.

programme.title: TITLE VII
programme.desc: The CEO of Sanger International, an IT consulting firm, is powerful and successful Hillary Kelsey. Kelsey is a black woman with no black employees and no one can figure out why until Darryl Montgomery, her 9:30 am interview, enters the firm.

programme.title: Pahokee - The Send Off
programme.desc: Three award-winning short films that exquisitely capture the Pahokee community, a small black Florida town.

programme.title: FIRST DATE
programme.desc: A former, female boxing champion and her business partner coach are mentoring two teenage girls, best friends through their non-profit gym.

programme.title: The Brink
programme.desc: The Brink centers around two stranded survivors in an endless wasteland who clash as they unravel the truth of what led them there.

programme.title: Pahokee - The Rabbit Hunt
programme.desc: Three award-winning short films that exquisitely capture the Pahokee community, a small black Florida town.

programme.title: Jazree's Court
programme.desc: Jazree's father was sent to jail for 7 years due to possession of an unloaded firearm. Jazree, who was close to her father, talks about the implication of growing up with him behind bars. Putting a person in jail doesn't just affect that individual it affects their entire family and community.

programme.title: The Jackie Robinson
programme.desc: After a successful baseball career in college and as a coach in the military, Jackie Robinson (playing himself) attracts the attention of Major League Baseball's Branch Rickey (Minor Watson). Rickey wants Robinson to play in the minor leagues, believing he can become the first player to break the color barrier and play in the majors. The only catch: He is forbidden from defending himself against racial bigotry. Supported by his wife (Ruby Dee), Robinson is steadfast in his determination to win.

programme.title: COMPANY TOWN
programme.desc: One man goes up against one of the nation's largest paper mill and chemical plants, owned by billionaire brothers Charles Koch and David Koch of Koch Industries, in a bid to save his town from sickness-causing pollution.

programme.title: AN UNCOMMON WOMAN
programme.desc: Mina is tired of her husband's infidelity and decides to take a drastic decision: She takes a second husband. Based on his conversations with women involved in polygamist relationships, filmmaker Abdoulaye Dao illustrates - to very funny effects - the daily life of two persons - in this case two men - who share a spouse.

programme.title: ANGELA
programme.desc: A Cuban immigrant tries to find her place in New York City.

programme.title: The Whole Gritty City
programme.desc: The documentary follows kids in three bands as the directors get them ready to perform in the Mardi Gras parades, and teach them to succeed and to survive. Through moments of setback, loss, discovery, and triumph, these children and their adult leaders reveal the power and resilience of a culture.

programme.title: FOR THE CAUSE
programme.desc: Mirai Scott, a civil rights attorney in Chicago, defends her estranged father, a former Black Panther, against a 30-year-old attempted murder charge. Long-held hostilities and accusations explode as Mirai aggressively pursues her father s defense.

programme.title: LITTLE MUSIC MANCHILD: THE STORY OF MALIK KOFI
programme.desc: The story follows an 11-year old African American Birmingham native, child prodigy who plays the cello.

programme.desc: Friends turn foes then friends again as this parody series pokes fun at the black comedy-drama genre while laughing at itself.

programme.desc: A documentary about a Los Angeles man who rents his three-bedroom home for $1 per month to help a family - he has never met - get on their feet.

programme.title: FUNK FORCE
programme.desc: A 'dysfunktional' team of young black superheroes fight against a hip-hop sensation hell bent on hypnotizing the black community.

programme.title: JMAXX AND THE UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE
programme.desc: Jarrell Sullivan is a teenager with autism, who has a difficult time communicating with the world.

programme.title: BROTHERS HYPNOTIC
programme.desc: For the eight young men in the Hypnotic Brass Ensemble, 'brotherhood' is literal: they're all sons of anti-establishment jazz legend, Phil Cohran.

programme.title: BLACK GIRL IN PARIS
programme.desc: When a down on her luck aspiring writer runs out of money after moving to Paris, she meets a street-smart prostitute who takes her on a whirlwind adventure of passion, self-discovery and uninhibited sexual freedom.

programme.title: The Thorn of the Rose
programme.desc: Prosecuting Attorney David Lunga's success is overshadowed by the terrifying secrets of Rosa, a beautiful but mysterious woman with whom he falls in love. What mysteries does she hide? As the macabre facts unravel, David comes face to face with his own demons and is driven to prove his innocence, recover his reputation and, above all, clear his own conscience.

programme.title: BECOMING FREE
programme.desc: Becoming Free follows three young people who are returning home to Washington, DC, after spending years or decades behind bars.

programme.title: BLACK MUSEUM
programme.desc: Through interviews and observation, Director Oliver Hardt, who frequently addresses black history and culture with a strong emphasis on architecture, takes us through the remarkable physical spaces, the palpable engagement of museum visitors, and gives us insight into the challenges faced during the design process. The success of the project serves as a reminder that design and advanced storytelling can challenge the dominant political discourse and enable a diverse conversation.

programme.title: Switch
programme.desc: A couple, Nessa and Camden, continue their tradition of looking through each others phones once a month, but questionable text messages reveal the truth.

programme.title: A Legend in the Classroom: The Life Story of Ms. Yvonne Busch
programme.desc: Born in New Orleans in 1929 and raised in the historic Trem section of the city, Ms. Busch, who mastered several brass instruments and the woodwinds, became a touring professional by the age of 12. Later in life, she provided the foundation for scores of New Orleans finest musicians, who excelled in careers in jazz, R&B and gospel, by teaching them the rudiments of music.

programme.title: DREAMTOWN
programme.desc: DreamTown is a documentary about the precarious dream of a young Afro-Ecuadorian soccer player, Anibal Chala, as he strives to make it to the professional leagues, and eventually sees his dreams become reality.

programme.title: MANGO WARS
programme.desc: Mango Wars, a comedy set in present day Kingston, Jamaica, follows Mr. Brown who runs a mango jelly business with his pregnant wife, Mrs. Brown. Fed up with the theft of mangoes from his mango tree and the impending birth of his first child, he develops an elaborate plan to catch the thief red handed. But when all of the traps are set off by unlikely elements, Mr. Brown has to rethink what really matters.

programme.title: FLY BY LIGHT - REUNION
programme.desc: In 2015, the award-winning documentary Fly By Light followed youth from Washington, DC for three years as they went underwent a powerful peace education program that culminated in a 7-day overnight retreat in the mountains of West Virginia.

programme.desc: Joe's date is kidnapped by circus people.

programme.desc: A long lost relatives turns up at the ranch.

programme.desc: Ben Cartwright unknowingly hires an outlaw.

programme.desc: Adam gets hurt while saving a woman.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: President of the railroad comes to visit the Shady Rest hotel.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
